mapper.insert: insert into memberinfo(userid, userpw, nickname, email) values(#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{nickname}, #{email})

insert into test_log(userid, agganx, socialanx, sadanx, complexanx, reganx, ma, diagnosis_result) values(#{userid}, #{agganx}, #{socialanx}, #{sadanx}, #{complexanx}, #{reganx}, #{ma}, #{diagnosis_result})
mapper.select: select * from (SELECT row_number()over(order by testidx desc) as recent ,tl.* FROM test_log as tl where userid = #{userid}) tmp where recent = 1;
select rawdata from (SELECT row_number()over(order by idx desc) as recent,idx, rawdata FROM testdata where userid =#{userid}) as tmp where recent = 1;
select image from (SELECT row_number()over(order by idx desc) as recent,idx, image FROM testdata where userid =#{userid}) as tmp where recent = 1;
select * from emotion_diary where userid=#{userid} and date_format(writedate,'%Y-%m-%d') = '2022-08-16';

select cntcol, count(cntcol) as cnt from( select case when emotion in ('pleasure', 'happy', 'love') then 1 when emotion in ('depress1', 'sad', 'regret') then 2 when emotion in ('upset', 'mad1', 'tired') then 3 else 0 end as cntcol from emotion_diary where userid = #{userid} and writedate between date_add(LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) , interval+1 day) and now() ) emotion_stat group by cntcol;

select cntcol, count(cntcol) as cnt from( select case when emotion in ('pleasure', 'happy', 'love') then 1 when emotion in ('depress1', 'sad', 'regret') then 2 when emotion in ('upset', 'mad1', 'tired') then 3 else 0 end as cntcol from emotion_diary where writedate between date_add(LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 2 month) , interval+1 day) and LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) ) emotion_stat group by cntcol;

select emotion, IFNULL(cnt,0) as cnt from emotionset es left outer join (select emotion, count(emotion) as cnt from emotion_diary as ed where userid = #{userid} and writedate between date_add(LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) , interval+1 day) and now() group by emotion) ed using(emotion);
